de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki

Class KDDTask

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.KDDTask

  • public class KDDTask
extends Object
    KDDTask encapsulates the common workflow of an unsupervised knowledge discovery task.
    Author:
    Arthur Zimek
